description: Add a dash of color and style to your day with the Verbatim Color Nano Wireless    Notebook Optical Mouse. Now in 7 great colors, this mouse travels well in tight    spaces. With a receiver that’s small enough to plug into your laptop and    leave, it offers 2.4 GHz wireless performance - that means no delays in cursor    movements and fewer cords to pack. The receiver also slides right into the bottom    of the mouse for safekeeping. Its sleek design offers a smooth, contoured comfort    grip for right or left hand and a programmable roller button – that means,    you can assign your favorite features to the roller and make your work easier.    Small enough to fit easily in work totes, backpacks or even handbags, the Verbatim    Nano Wireless Notebook Optical Mouse offers cool colors to match your laptop,    your bag or even your mood.
title: Verbatim 96898 Nano Wireless Notebook Optical Mouse - Green
